QuestData.Title: To the Hilt!
QuestData.Description: You immediately recognize this statue from a sketch in Furien's Journal.$b$bThough the words associated with the entry elude you, the sketch seems self-explanatory. After battle, the enemies' weapons were to be cast upon the basin in exchange for a divine gift of some sort.$b$bAs you ponder this ritual, the glint of steel catches your eye from a nearby weapon rack....
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to collect 20 Satyr Sabers from the weapon racks and various satyrs in the region, then place them upon the statue, Elune's Handmaiden.
QuestData.RewardText: With the ritual completed, you are awarded a divine gift.$b$bYou can't help but wonder what Elune would think of someone such as you receiving one of her boons.
